sentences.en: Does Paganism belong under the New Age umbrella?
sentences.cn: 在新时代,异教徒会受到保护 吗 ?

sentences.en: Emperor of Rome ( 361 - 363 ) who attempted to restore the official dominance of paganism.
sentences.cn: 罗马皇帝 ( 361-363年 ),曾试图恢复对异教徒的法定统治.

sentences.en: Paganism: If you send shit out into the world, it will return to you threefold.
sentences.cn: 异教: 如果你在世上屙出狗屎, 你就会遇到三倍的狗屎.
她放弃异教而改信基督教.

sentences.en: The country swayed precariously between Christianity and paganism.
sentences.cn: 这个国家在基督教和异教之间摇摆不定。

sentences.en: You will find religious groups ranging all the way from fundamentalist Christianity to paganism to Buddhism.
sentences.cn: 你将会找到宗教性专题,范围很广,有基督教、异教信仰乃至佛教.

trans.tran_cn: 信奉异教，不信教，异教徒的信仰和实践
trans.tran_en: Paganism is pagan beliefs and activities
